snippet.title: A Duel Hand Disaster: Trackher Annoucement Trailer 2016 | PS4 PS Vita
snippet.description:
Footage is from a work in progress and does not reflect the final badassery-ness of awesome.

ADHD is an arcade-like score chasing shooter centered on two themes: risk and focus. The challenge comes not only from controlling two ships simultaneously but from the player’s ability to focus on his score and deciding if it’s best to stay in and risk losing everything or leave with the score at hand. If his ship is destroyed any score he had becomes a big whopping zero.

http://www.aduelhanddisaster.com

Created In El Paso, Texas by Ask An Enemy Studios | http://www.askanenemystudios.com
Music by Howard Roarke | http://www.thehowardroarke.com
